properties.description:
Read data from folders and sub folders.
Wildcard characters.
file metadata functions - filename() and 
filepath()

content.query:
--select database 
use nyc_taxi_discovery

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 20 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data


--select data from folder
SELECT
    TOP 20 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data


--select data from subfolders
SELECT
    TOP 20 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data


--get data from one or more file
SELECT
    TOP 20 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
                'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=03/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data


--use more than on wildcard character
SELECT
    TOP 20 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data


--file metadata function filename()
SELECT
    TOP 20 
    greeen_trip_data.filename() as file_name,
    greeen_trip_data.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data


--count each file records
SELECT
    greeen_trip_data.filename() as file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data
GROUP BY greeen_trip_data.filename()
ORDER BY greeen_trip_data.filename()


--limit data using filename()
SELECT
    greeen_trip_data.filename() as file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data
WHERE greeen_trip_data.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY greeen_trip_data.filename()
ORDER BY greeen_trip_data.filename()


----file metadata function filepath()
SELECT
    greeen_trip_data.filename() as file_name,
    greeen_trip_data.filepath() as file_path,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data
WHERE greeen_trip_data.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY greeen_trip_data.filename(),greeen_trip_data.filepath()
ORDER BY greeen_trip_data.filename(),greeen_trip_data.filepath()



SELECT
    greeen_trip_data.filename() as file_name,
    greeen_trip_data.filepath(1) as year,
    greeen_trip_data.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data
WHERE greeen_trip_data.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY greeen_trip_data.filename(),greeen_trip_data.filepath(1),greeen_trip_data.filepath(2)
ORDER BY greeen_trip_data.filename(),greeen_trip_data.filepath(1),greeen_trip_data.filepath(2)


--query to counnt number of trips per month and year
SELECT
    greeen_trip_data.filepath(1) as year,
    greeen_trip_data.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data
GROUP BY greeen_trip_data.filename(),greeen_trip_data.filepath(1),greeen_trip_data.filepath(2)
ORDER BY greeen_trip_data.filename(),greeen_trip_data.filepath(1),greeen_trip_data.filepath(2)


--use filepath() funtion in where clause
SELECT
    greeen_trip_data.filepath(1) as year,
    greeen_trip_data.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS greeen_trip_data
WHERE greeen_trip_data.filepath(1) = '2020' 
AND greeen_trip_data.filepath(2) in('06','07','08')
GROUP BY greeen_trip_data.filename(),greeen_trip_data.filepath(1),greeen_trip_data.filepath(2)
ORDER BY greeen_trip_data.filename(),greeen_trip_data.filepath(1),greeen_trip_data.filepath(2)
